amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $18.5 million for research and development activities of the United States Coast Guard.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered eleven printed in the Congressional Record to increase U.S. Coast Guard acquisition, construction and improvements funding by $18,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Simmons amendment Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Simmons.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Simmons amendment Failed by voice vote.
